QuestData.Title: Connection to Ohn'ahra
QuestData.Description:
The wind is restless here, $n. Ohn'ahra is reaching out. I must answer her call.
I need reagents for my ritual: reeds from the riverbanks, feathers from the tails of mallards, and the heart of a salamanther. Gather these materials from the river so that I may heed her voice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa River Reeds, $2oa Fowl Tailfeathers, and a Salamanther Heart from the river banks.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. I will use these materials to interpret her song.
